description.0: A heavy greatsword. A clock is embedded within it, though its internal mechanisms have long been damaged.

0.0: Taking DMG generates a shield which absorbs DMG up to <cryo>20%</cryo> of Max HP. This shield lasts for 10s or until broken, and can only be triggered once every <cryo>45</cryo>s. While protected by a shield, the character gains <cryo>12%</cryo> increased DMG.
